alert.note: Alert for Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued November 19 at 4:17AM MST until November 19 at 7:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. Wave heights of 1-2 feet are possible on Lake Mead and wave heights of 2-3 feet are possible on Lake Mohave. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected over Lake Mohave.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.

area.areaDesc: Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area
